users.bio: A passionate fullstack developer based in Vietnam.
Front-end Developer with a passion for clean UI
Junior Backend Developer focusing on Node.js
A leading technology firm specializing in innovative full-stack solutions with Node.js and React.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer (Node.js & React)
jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for a talented Fullstack Developer proficient in Node.js and React.
jobs.requirements:
- 3+ years experience with Node.js and React
- Familiar with REST API
- Experience with MongoDB and PostgreSQL
jobs.benefits:
- Competitive salary
- Health insurance
- Flexible working hours
jobs.howToApply: Send your CV to hr@technova.com with subject 'Fullstack Developer Application'

jobs.title: Backend Developer (Java/Spring Boot)
jobs.jobDescription: Join us as a Senior Backend Developer with expertise in Java and Spring Boot.
jobs.requirements:
- 5+ years of Java experience
- Strong knowledge of Spring Boot
- Familiar with Microservices architecture
jobs.benefits:
- 13th month salary
- Premium healthcare
- Training budget
